import React from 'react'; class AuthorDetails extends React.Component { render() { const id = this.props.match.params.id; let Book = books.find((b) => { return (b.id === +id); }); console.log(Book); return ( <> Read Currently Reading Add Shelf ;
{Book.title} By {Book.author} {/* rating */}




{/* rating */} {Book.description} {Book.pages} Page {Book.category} ) } } export default AuthorDetails;
